original: Årholm, Simon Johannes, tandläkare, Varberg, f. 20/1/97 i Uddevalla. G. 31 m. tandl. Hedvig Eriksson. — Stud:ex. i Gbg 18, tandl :kand. 28, tandläk. 31. Aman. v. tandl :inst. tand-kir. avd. 30, v. dess tandfylln :avd. s. å., assist, v. samma avd. 31, assist, i Kristianstad 31-32, praktik i Varberg sed. 32. Ordf. i Varbergs sportskyt-tekl. sed. 40, v. ordf. i Varbergs skyt-tefören. Medl. av Frimurarorden. Hobby: jakt. Statens mäsit :märke i mauserskjutn. o. riksmed. i S 40, Gm i olymp, kortdis t :skjutn.
translated: Årholm, Simon Johannes, dentist, Varberg, b. 20/1/97 in Uddevalla. Married on 31 m. tandl. Hedvig Eriksson. — Graduated from secondary school in Gothenburg in 1918, graduated as a dental candidate in 1928, became a dentist in 1931. Assistant at the dental institute in the dental surgery department in 1930, in the dental filling department in the same year, assistant in Kristianstad from 1931-1932, practicing in Varberg since 1932. Chairman of Varberg's sports shooting club since 1940, vice chairman of Varberg's shooting association. Member of the Freemasonry Order. Hobby: hunting. Received the State Marksmanship Medal in rifle shooting and national medal in Sweden in 1940. Married in Olympic short-range shooting.
